author: lgo
msg: On the ra_serf-digest-authn branch: validate the response digest sent
back by the server to enable mutual authentication.
(serf_auth_protocols[]): Add the response handlers for all authn protocol
(handle_digest_auth): reset cnonce every time the server returns a 401. This
(validate_response_digest_auth): New function, validates the response digest.
* BRANCH-README: Mark task as done, mark other tasks as 'won't do'.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r36310, make svn_dirent_is_root() return true for absolute
and non absolute roots. This re-enables walking up the tree with
svn_dirent_dirname() while checking for the top with svn_dirent_is_root().
Also fix a few corner cases on joining with non absolute roots.
(svn_dirent_join): Correctly handle joining non-absolute non '/' roots
(svn_dirent_join_many): Join all non absolute rooted paths using
